text: The Exorcism of Emily Rose is a horror-drama movie of 2005. Laura Linney and Mary Beth Hurt star. This horror movie got mixed reviews. ==Other websites== * Category:2005 horror movies Category:2005 drama movies Category:American horror movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Religious horror movies Category:Movies directed by Scott Derrickson Category:Movies about exorcism Category:Movies about lawyers Category:Movies about Catholicism
title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
